about.title: About Example Page
about.description: This example page demonstrates various Aurora Module WebUI features and API usage:
about.feature1: Counter: Demonstrates state management and UI updates
about.feature2: Toast Messages: Shows different types of notification messages
about.feature3: Dialogs: Shows confirmation and input dialogs
about.feature4: Command Execution: Demonstrates Shell command execution functionality
